name: Vigormortis
ability: Each night*, choose a player: they die. Minions you kill keep their ability & poison 1 Townsfolk neighbor. [-1 Outsider]
otherNightReminder: The Vigormortis chooses a player.  If that player is a Minion, poison a neighboring Townsfolk.

jinxes.reason: A Mastermind that has their ability keeps it if the Vigormortis dies.
